title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU/GPU runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & more with a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama as LLM/Embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (Docker ready) for Ollama with multi-user, model manager, code highlighting.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat over local documents.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around the Ollama CLI with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with explain/refactor commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA & ROCm variants and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central) supporting streaming, chat, embeddings, and tool calls.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async/sync bindings and strong types for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, request logging, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history and model downloads.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: haystack-ollama) to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat with Ollama models and upload files for RAG answers.

title: ollama-rustlang
summary: Community Rust SDK (crates.io: ollama) with strongly-typed requests and WebSocket streaming.

title: ollama-nextjs
summary: Starter template for Next.js 14 app that uses ollama-js to stream chat completions on the edge runtime.
